Entertainment Order ConfirmationDear michael taylor Thank you for your Entertainment Book order Your order has been received and is being processed Below is confirmation of the books that you have ordered as well as your order confirmation numbers Please use the confirmation numbers when making any inquiries regarding delivery of your orders Your order confirmation number is Books Ordered Houston Subtotal Shipping Total Your credit card will be billed upon shipment If you have any questions or concerns regarding this order please email Customer Service at or call during the hours of AM to PM EST Monday through Friday and AM to PM EST Saturday And if you didnt register when you purchased online be sure to visit wwwentertainmentcom and register once you receive your order You definitely dont want to miss out on these great member benefits and additional savings Printable coupons that offer up to savings like the ones in your book savings at over merchants in your local area and throughout North America through our Frequent Values program Search through our Frequent Values online to find savings wherever you are You can use Frequent Value discounts as often as youd like Just show your card to save Directory of over hotels worldwide offering savings on rack room rates Great online offers at top etailers like Amazoncom Targetcom and Alamocom Discounted prices on the purchase of additional Entertainment Books The convenience of maps and driving directions to your favorite establishments Updates specific to your local edition and other Entertainment editions Thank you for shopping at entertainmentcom where your savings start today Member pricing is valid for all books with the exception of your local edition
